channel.title: [PI] Destiny Pk Development Team!
channel.description:
I'm looking for a coding team, people who have knowledge of java and have worked with PI 317 loading 634. If you think that you can be a helpful part of the team please PM me using one of the following forms filled out...
Server Developer! [code]Name: Age: Ever worked on a server before: Ever used project insanity base (PI) (317): How long can you work for (hours): What days are you available: AIM: MSN: [/code]
Client Developer! [code]Name: Age: Ever worked on a server before: Ever used Destination Pk client base (PI) (317 loading 634): How long can you work for (hours): What days are you available: AIM: MSN: [/code]
Forums Developer! [code]Name: Age: Ever made/developed a forum before?: Ever used Forumotion?: How long can you work for (hours): What days are you available: AIM: MSN: [/code]
More info! [code]I am using Project Insanity based source with LOADS of editing, DSPK client again with LOADS of editing and some amazing items! [/code]
Trailer Video of my PI project so far (was a few days ago since then I added a lot more!) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TK_Lgfh_p2k]Click here for the video![/url]
Since that video I have added the following: All 4 coloured whips (they look almost the same as RS's) New summoning base which will be developed into a skill! FULLY working Korasi's sword with spec! Ancient ceremonial robes and pernix stuff! Started working on a dungeoneering minigame (I'll go into more detail when its nearly finished :) ) Fixed a MAJOR cache bug which was stopping things from loading and freezing the client :)
Things to do or maybe: Add nex? (Maybe...) Add 508 maps (E.g. Edgeville map update...) (Maybe...) Working on a dungeoneering minigame as stated above :) Adding WORKING beast of burden. (Takes the piss to do because I'm a horrible client developer :roll: )
I hope to see a lot of PMs and Replies :D
- Mikey :cool:

item.title: [PI] Destiny Pk Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Too many servers have all of this none the less, good luck.

item.title: [PI] Destiny Pk Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

I’m looking for a coding team, people who have knowledge of java and have worked with PI 317 loading 634.
If you think that you can be a helpful part of the team please PM me using one of the following forms filled out…

Server Developer!

Name: Age: Ever worked on a server before: Ever used project insanity base (PI) (317): How long can you work for (hours): What days are you available: AIM: MSN:

Client Developer!

Name: Age: Ever worked on a server before: Ever used Destination Pk client base (PI) (317 loading 634): How long can you work for (hours): What days are you available: AIM: MSN:

Forums Developer!

Name: Age: Ever made/developed a forum before?: Ever used Forumotion?: How long can you work for (hours): What days are you available: AIM: MSN:

More info!

I am using Project Insanity based source with LOADS of editing, DSPK client again with LOADS of editing and some amazing items!

Trailer Video of my PI project so far (was a few days ago since then I added a lot more!)
Click here for the video!

Since that video I have added the following:
All 4 coloured whips (they look almost the same as RS’s)
New summoning base which will be developed into a skill!
FULLY working Korasi’s sword with spec!
Ancient ceremonial robes and pernix stuff!
Started working on a dungeoneering minigame (I’ll go into more detail when its nearly finished )
Fixed a MAJOR cache bug which was stopping things from loading and freezing the client

Things to do or maybe:
Add nex? (Maybe…)
Add 508 maps (E.g. Edgeville map update…) (Maybe…)
Working on a dungeoneering minigame as stated above
Adding WORKING beast of burden. (Takes the piss to do because I’m a horrible client developer :roll: )

I hope to see a lot of PMs and Replies

  • Mikey

Read full topic
